pluginstrument.author: enjxp_SimPassion
pluginstrument.description:
--------------------------------------------------- Transcripted by enjxp_SimPassion to ZIBOmod I've also designed and re-created all buttons, dials and switches --------------------------------------------------- For main background image : using original background and global panel lights graphics parts from ZiboMod, thanks to the kind agreement of the designer AudioBirdXP --------------------------------------------------- This panel is a modification of Russ Barlow's MCP for the EADT x737 based on Joe Venzon Boeing 737NG MCP -------------------------------------------------- This Mode Control Panel (MCP) is only usable with ZiboMod Boeing 737-800X for X-Plane 11. The panel duplicates the function of the 737-800's MCP.
1.1.3 Adding Hardware handling from Tony & Keith with some my own customizations on User Properties 1.1.2 Removed dials acceleration, as it's now handled in internal coding in 3D Cockpit 1.1.1 Fixed overspeed and underspeed indicators behavior Added dials acceleration 1.1.0 Previous fonts removed and new one added for a licensing concern 1.0.9 Fixed an issue where the VS wheel was not displayed with missing bitmap 1.0.8 Enhanced Scroll wheel handling : now react with touch and mouse with a sliding effect 1.0.7 Fixed MCP Brightness handling issue Fixed digits not displayed with BAT switched to ON on start Fixed overspeed and underspeed behavior Reduced min Voltage limit where MCP digits will switch OFF by themselves (from 5V to 3V) trying to follow ZiboMod behavior Added Digits flashing on Display Light Test 1.0.6 Fixed VVI wheel not working properly in touch mode (if mouse mode is enabled in AM/AP, mouse wheel will always only work in the same direction in each related up or down half-size of area, or using left mouse click) Fixed VNAV button issue Fixed V/S button issue Adjusted touch area for bank selector Both F/D light and A/T ARM light enhancement while MAIN PANEL Light is more than 50% (they were previously half masked) Added "A" IAS indicator and under speed management 1.0.5 Fixed MCP Speed display issue condition only on "Show IAS" 1.0.4 Initial release
